questions.text: Which AWS service would you use as an object store?
How many AWS services are certified to the IRAP Protected Level?

answers.42: 42 services in Sydney, with a further 8 globally at Unclassified DLM.

answers.office: An office where Amazon has staff
answers.region: A collection of 2 or more availability zones, connected by high-speed, low latency links
answers.distcenter: An area where you can have Amazon packages delivered
answers.datacentre: A data centre, full of server racks

questions.text: Which AWS service is used for management identity and access?

answers.external: You need to utilise an external service, like LDAP or Active Directory, for this.

questions.text: Who is the CEO of AWS?
